collectionMetadata.name: Usage of Traditional Media Devices
collectionMetadata.description:
Dataset shows the percentage of consumers who have ever used a traditional media device, e.g. TV, newspaper, etc., for media activities. 

The data was extracted from the IMDA Media Consumer Experience Study, an annual survey conducted by IMDA , which aims to provide insights into Singapore Citizens and PRs' media consumption habits.

For more information, please visit: 
https://www.imda.gov.sg/industry-development/facts-and-figures/media-consumer-experience-study

datasetMetadata.name: Usage of Traditional Devices for Media Activities
datasetMetadata.description: Data shows the percentage of respondents who ever used traditional devices, e.g. TV, newspapers, etc., for media activities.
